Module ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2

Package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint

package ca.utoronto.utm.assignment2.paint
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description

  • Class
    Description
    DrawModeStrategy
    A strategy class for handling drawing behavior in a painting application.
    ModeStrategy
    Interface representing the strategy for handling different modes of interaction in the painting application.
    ModeStrategyFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of different ModeStrategy implementations.
    ObjectEraserStrategy
    Strategy for erasing objects in the painting application.
    Paint
    Main application class for the Paint application.
    PaintController
    Controller class that handles user input and interaction with the paint canvas.
    PaintModel
    PaintModel is responsible for managing shapes in the paint application.
    PaintProperties
    This class represents the properties of a shape, providing the model for attributes such as fill color, border color, border width, and stroke thickness.
    PaintStrategy
    The PaintStrategy class provides a method to select and return an appropriate shape based on the currently activated mode in the paint application.
    PaintView
    The PaintView class represents the view of the paint application, extending the Canvas class to display the drawing area.
    PolylineModeStrategy
    A class implementing the mode strategy for drawing a polyline on the canvas.
    SelectModeStrategy
    The SelectModeStrategy class implements the ModeStrategy interface and handles the behavior of selecting and moving shapes in the paint application.
    TextModeStrategy
    The TextModeStrategy class implements the ModeStrategy interface and handles the behavior of creating and editing text boxes in the paint application.
